meanings.definition: An enzyme that breaks down certain chemicals in the body
meanings.sent1: The pseudocholinesterase in our body helps break down harmful substances.
meanings.sent2: Doctors check the levels of pseudocholinesterase to monitor health.
meanings.sent3: The pseudocholinesterase enzyme decided to throw a party for the other enzymes.
meanings.sent4: Her pseudocholinesterase was like a superhero, swiftly neutralizing toxins.
meanings.sent5: Imagine pseudocholinesterase as a tiny cleanup crew inside us.

meanings.definition: A protein that helps regulate nerve signals
meanings.sent1: The pseudocholinesterase protein plays a crucial role in nerve communication.
meanings.sent2: Nerve cells rely on pseudocholinesterase to transmit signals effectively.
meanings.sent3: The pseudocholinesterase protein told jokes to keep the nerves entertained.
meanings.sent4: His pseudocholinesterase seemed like a conductor orchestrating nerve symphonies.
meanings.sent5: Visualize pseudocholinesterase as a traffic controller for nerve messages.
